评论概述: Comfy, good quality scrubs, for a decent price!
评论详情: As a petite female, ( I weight 123 and am 5’2) it is extremely difficult to find scrub pants that fit and are not enormous on me. These come in an XX-small and with most brands the smallest size is an extra small which is still baggy on me. The XX-small size fits perfectly. The material is soft and does have some stretch to it. And they are not super expensive, I was buying Figs, but these are half the price of what Figs cost. The only thing I would change is I wish they had more pockets, but that is just my preference. I am used to the Figs which have 4 pockets on the front and these only have 2. I still prefer these over Figs though!
